name: SkeleTown (SpyPuppet)
description:
SkeleTown

Student project for Senac's Jogos Digitais course, SkeleTown is an adventure game where you play as other game's monsters.

Break the cycle of violence and rebuild a SkeleTown so monsters can be welcome.

Rebuild it up!

Controls
  • WASD to run
  • Q to use bombs
  • F to eat food
  • Space to dash
  • Click Left Mouse Button to light attack.
  • Hold Left Mouse Button to strong attack.
